p: Currently, there are no available vaccines or specific medicines for the treatment of COVID-19. In light of the outbreak, various treatment modalities have been considered, including herbal medicine, which has been widely used during the past epidemic outbreaks, such as severe acute respiratory syndrome (SARS) and H1N1 influenza. The phytochemicals identified from IK, MMG, and VG are active molecules with potential biological properties such as anti-viral, anti-inflammatory, and immunomodulatory activities.
